#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<string>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXSIZE 111111
int main()
{
	int T;
	int n;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		if(n&(n-1))
			cout<<"BMEENA"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"BKUL"<<endl;
	}
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
